title: Don't think I don't think. Fair enough
creator_credit: Dale Baker, Hodja Ed Res Co-op, La Trobe University, Open Channel Productions and Preston Institute of Technology
brief_description: 1. “Don’t think I don’t think”. A workshop of the 1981 South Pacific Regional Conference on Mental Retardation. 2. “Fair enough”. The experiences of students finding difficulty in mantaining dignity and rights in the face of “hidden curricula” of school.
